title: Shah Rukh Khan-Gauri Khan Groove To Chris Martin's Tunes At Akash-Shloka's St Moritz Bash
text:
Let's accept the fact that all the pictures and videos that have landed on our social media from Ambani's pre-wedding bash in Switzerland is giving us major #FOMO feels.
From Chris Martin's live-performance to the winter-wonderland that was set up in Switzerland for the couple-Akash and Shloka, it was the kind of the celebration that you only see in films and read about in romantic novels.
The three-day party in Switzerland was attended by a large number of Bollywood A-listers that include Shah Rukh Khan, Gauri Khan, Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor, Malaika Arora in St. Mortiz, Switzerland.
And now, there are some more videos that have resurfaced on the internet. These videos prove that during Chris Martin's live-performance, the whole atmosphere changed to an extent that it looked like a live-concert!
Here's an inside view of how Shah Rukh Khan-Gauri with Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor danced to Chris Martin's tunes at Akash-Shloka's pre-wedding bash.
Don't Miss 529 SHARES 554 SHARES 944 SHARES 2.3 K SHARES 13.6 K SHARES
Akash and Shloka will tie the knot on March 9 and the wedding will take place at World Trade Center, Jio Garden Bandra Kurla Complex. The wedding will be a three day affair in India with two receptions after the wedding.

And now, there are some more videos that have resurfaced on the internet.
